Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_CERTIFICADO, T1.SEQ_CRITICA, T1.IND_TP_PROPOSTA, T1.SIT_PROPOSTA, T1.COD_MSG_CRITICA, T1.NUM_CPF_CNPJ, T1.NUM_PROPOSTA, T1.NUM_APOLICE, T1.COD_SUBGRUPO, T1.COD_CRM, T1.VLR_IS, T1.VLR_PREMIO, T1.DTA_OCORRENCIA, T1.DTA_RCAP, T1.STA_CRITICA, T1.DES_COMPLEMENTAR_A, T1.DES_COMPLEMENTAR_B, T1.DES_COMPLEMENTAR_C, T1.DES_COMPLEMENTAR_D, T1.COD_USUARIO, T1.NOM_PROGRAMA, T1.DTH_CADASTRAMENTO FROM SEGUROS.VG_N001_STA_GLOBAL ORDER BY T1.NUM_CERTIFICADO, T1.SEQ_CRITICA END SQL
